sheep.collision
Class Interval

java.lang.Object
  sheep.collision.Interval

public class Interval
extends java.lang.Object

Contains an interval used in the collision detection algortihm. This class exists only to make the high level algorithms more readable.

Constructor Summary
Interval(float lower, float upper)
          Creates a new Interval with the specified bounds.

 float getOverlap(Interval i)
          Gets overlap between the two Intervals.
 boolean isSeparate(Interval i)
          Checks whether two Intervals are separate.

clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait
 

Constructor Detail

Interval

public Interval(float lower,
                float upper)
Creates a new Interval with the specified bounds. It is NOT verified that lower < upper!

Parameters:
lower - The lower bound.
upper - The upper bound.
Method Detail

getOverlap

public float getOverlap(Interval i)
Gets overlap between the two Intervals.

Parameters:
i - The other Interval which may or may not overlap.
Returns:
The overlap. May be negative.

isSeparate

public boolean isSeparate(Interval i)
Checks whether two Intervals are separate.

Parameters:
i - The other Interval which may or may not overlap.
Returns:
True on overlap, false otherwise.

toString

public java.lang.String toString()
Converts the Interval to a String.

Overrides:
toString in class java.lang.Object
Returns:
A string on the form (lower, upper).
